content: What to say ‘No’ to? Cory Zue I think you have put in great systems for self accountability and measured productivity. My big question whenever I have time to myself is how to craft my ‘No’ list. These are things I should say no to because they take me off course or split my already limited resources into more piles. This is my biggest sabbatical fear is that life’s inherent wild goose chases will take me off course… naturally this includes many things that are fun, interesting, and even beneficial. Interested to know if you have any thoughts on this.
